text.tspan: Annual number of homicides per 100,000 people.

Homicide rate (WHO Mortality Database)
(homicides per 100,000 people)
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024); United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (2025); WHO Mortality Database (2024)
